channel.title: PyTorch on Spencer Braun
channel.description: Recent content in PyTorch on Spencer Braun

item.title: Unsupervised Text Style Transfer with Deep Learning
item.description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) is one area of deep learning that continues to make substantial, and often surprising, progress while also adding value to existing businesses. Supervised tasks like neural machine translation produce high quality, real-time results and Gmail’s predictive text feature often feels like magic. I have been most interested in recent applications of generative text models, such as using GPT-2 to play chess, write poetry, or create custom games.
